events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their vehicle and another car at a traffic light intersection.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after confirming the involvement of the customer's car in the collision.
An agent was assigned to the case to assist with the auto accident claim and to guide the customer through the process.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the auto accident claim and assured timely handling of the case.
Requested police report, photos of vehicle damage, and the other driver's insurance information to proceed with the investigation.
The customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and photos showing the extent of the collision damage.
The insurance team began the investigation to verify accident details and evaluate the vehicle damage reported by the claimant.
Investigation completed confirming fault and verifying the claim details, no discrepancies were found in the submitted evidence.
A settlement offer was proposed for the repair costs of the damaged vehicle based on assessment and current market rates.
The customer gave positive feedback on the settlement proposal and expressed gratitude for the quick resolution process.
The claim was officially approved after acceptance of the settlement offer by the customer, finalizing the insurance process.
Payment for the approved vehicle repair costs was issued to the customerâ€™s registered bank account without delays.
The auto accident claim was closed after successful payment and confirmation that repair work had commenced.
